meanings.definition: An infectious disease caused by bacteria of the genus Shigella, typically resulting in severe diarrhea.
meanings.sent1: Shigellosis can cause severe stomach upset.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with shigellosis after the stool test.
meanings.sent3: When the whole family got shigellosis, they had to take turns using the bathroom.
meanings.sent4: The spread of shigellosis in the community was like a wildfire, affecting many people.
meanings.sent5: The symptoms of shigellosis include stomach cramps and watery diarrhea.

meanings.definition: The condition of being infected with Shigella bacteria.
meanings.sent1: After the picnic, several cases of shigellosis were reported.
meanings.sent2: Proper hygiene can help prevent the spread of shigellosis.
meanings.sent3: The outbreak of shigellosis at the school was a cause for concern.
meanings.sent4: The rise in shigellosis cases signaled the need for better sanitation practices.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained the symptoms of shigellosis to the worried parents.
